Code Guide & Usage
==================

Installation Guide
------------------

.. highlight:: bash

**Requirements**

- Python 3.x
- Other dependencies listed in ``requirements.txt``

**Installation Steps**

Run the following commands:

.. code-block:: bash

   $ pip install -r requirements.txt
   $ python setup.py install
